name: Puzzle Project
description: This is our 1000 piece puzzle. We are inviting you to “sponsor“ a piece (or more if you choose) of this puzzle for $5 and take part in bringing our little one home. With each piece sponsored we will write your name on the back and put that piece of the puzzle in place. A permanent reminder of the part you played in our journey. Once the puzzle is complete we will have it framed in double sided glass so that we can always see both sides of the puzzle and each person who contributed. I am so excited to one day share this finished piece of love with our child and show him/her how much he/she  has always been loved.
